
import sys

a , b = map(int , sys.stdin.readline().split())

while a + b :
	
	if a == 0 or a == 1:
		belowA = 0
	elif a == 2 :
		belowA = 1
	else :
		belowA = 2
		i = 1
		j = 2
		c = i+j
		while c < a :
			belowA+=1
			i = j
			j = c
			c = i+j
		
	if b == 0 :
		uptoB = 0
	elif b == 1 :
		uptoB = 1
	else :
		uptoB = 2
		i = 1
		j = 2
		c = i+j
		while c <= b :
			uptoB+=1
			i = j
			j = c
			c = i+j
	#print uptoB , belowA
	print uptoB-belowA
	a , b = map(int , sys.stdin.readline().split())
